overview: A law professor (Ryan Mclane) and his star graduate student Brooke (Lacy Lennon) are tasked with investigating several alleged student-teacher affairs that have occurred at the university. Through the course of their investigation tensions build both between their conflicting ideas on if these relationships were wrong, and with their own taboo desires for each other.
tagline: The better the sex, the better the student body
title: Student Bodies 8
